# Installation on Windows

# Requirements

  • Microsoft Visual Studio (Tested with Visual Studio 2017)
  • CMake (Latest version recommended)
  • Git

# Build

$ git clone https://github.com/oatpp/oatpp.git
$ cd oatpp\
$ MD build
$ cd build\

$ cmake ..
$ cmake --build . --target INSTALL
